creator: fromnothing-creation
title: Monkeywrench the Hollywood-Industrial Complex
materials_required: Uploader status on public torrent sites
description: This project aims to disrupt the Hollywood-Industrial Complex by modifying and redistributing movies in a way that subverts the intended experience, thereby challenging the control of media conglomerates and empowering artists.
steps: Set up a DNS proxy to protect your online activity from surveillance by the NSA and MPAA.
Gain access to private torrent trackers to obtain scene releases quickly. Seek guidance from local collective houses or bike co-ops.
Create an anonymous email address (e.g., using riseup.net or mail.com) and use it to create accounts on public torrent sites.
Download videos from private torrent sites and redistribute them on public torrent sites, requesting uploader status.

Acquire a movie file and modify it in subtle ways, such as abruptly ending the movie at the climax, adding high-pitched feedback sounds, removing the soundtrack, changing the movie to black and white, or adding large subtitles.

Upload your modified movie to torrent sites, disguising it using terminology associated with elite hackers. Monitor the downloads and enjoy knowing that you contributed in empowering artists everywhere.
